name: The Lab is forever(Demo)
description:
Hello! This is a project I am working on and this is early access for the game I ask for donations so I can release the full version on steam and other game sites that require money!

This game is a puzzle/parkour/shooter game. This will be a full game with voice actors, custom models, and other goodies

Controls:

WASD to move Space to jump and Ctrl to crouch

Climbing: Run into the wall jump and crouch at the same time then un-crouch to climb faster.

Run: Shift + W,A,S, or D

Exit: alt+f4 use if you fall sorry I dont have an exit or play button will add soon!
